name: Who Am I (Ling Peiyu)
description:
This is 2023 GGJ game.

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/who-am-i-4

 For expressing ROOTS, the game shows a story of a man trying to find who he is and where he belongs to. In short, the man is searching for his ROOT. He will explore his family's history and experience his family members' stories.

Designer: me

Programmer: me

Artist: me

Music: Nostalgic Piano-Rafael Krux
